author: Peggy Truong
title: Funniest Tweets About Moonlight Winning Oscar for Best Picture – Best Memes and Reactions to La La Land Mix-Up

organizations.name: la la land mix-up getty advertisement

text: Getty Advertisement - Continue Reading Below Hello. It's Monday Feb. 27 and just a few moments ago, Moonlight was named Best Picture at the 89th Academy Awards after one of the most awkward and shocking TV moments in the history of award shows. WATCH: Moment where crew/cast of 'La La Land' realizes a mistake had been made and 'Moonlight' actually won Best Picture. #Oscars pic.twitter.com/WCCopwsJ66 — Good Morning America (@GMA) February 27, 2017 Half of the world is still coming to terms with what just transpired on live television but here we are: we now live in a reality where TV fuck-ups a la Steve Harvey Miss Universe 2015 can repeat itself. You're not dreaming. Nope. Not you. Not your dog. Not Oprah . Here, the Internet tries to make sense of the best Oscars ever (maybe). 1. — billy eichner (@billyeichner) February 27, 2017 Advertisement - Continue Reading Below
